name: FPV Freerider
description: RC Quadcopter Racing Simulator - Fly (and crash!) all you want regardless of the weather, all for the price of a few replacement props.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2Ghz or Higher/ AMD 2Ghz or Higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 960M / Radeon HD 7750 or higher, 1GB video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: A game controller/RC radio is highly recommended. Integrated Intel HD graphics cards not recommended.
